results.name: For n=2^k, a(n) = binomial(k + 2, 2), else 0.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1024
formula: Multiplicative with a(2^e) = binomial(e + 2, 2), a(p^e) = 0 for odd prime p.
Dirichlet convolution of A104117 and A209229.
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Apr 17 2007
ext: Name changed and terms a(40) and beyond from _Andrew Howroyd_, Aug 03 2018
